channel.title: Gauntlet Video Roundup - November 2, 2019 - Gauntlet Con Edition!
channel.description:
Greetings, all! [This week's special Gauntlet Con edition of the Gauntlet Hangouts video roundup post](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/blog/gauntlet-video-roundup-november-2-2019) is now up on The Gauntlet Blog!
You can catch all the recorded Gauntlet Con 2019 games on [this YouTube playlist](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL26DVDSsqVz4aSRXvEBH7LO76JTZPbzFW), and you can also catch the panels, workshops, and live podcast episodes on [this playlist](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL26DVDSsqVz6myvGhdrS4l7sJ5ha17kCT). Thanks to everyone who facilitated and played, and thanks to everyone who made Gauntlet Con 2019 such an amazing experience! If you want to join in the fun (which continues all year round), head over to the [Gauntlet Hangouts category](https://discourse.funtimers.club/c/gauntlet-hangouts) on the Forums to see the latest game announcements, and sign up on the [Gauntlet Hangouts Calendar](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/) to play!
